Translations.Text: Ai lie fu, lia mu, la yi. Zhexie shi tian jing--mingbai de “gulanjing” de jie wen.
Buxindao zhe huoxu yao xiwang tamen yuan shi guishun de.
Ni tingren tamen chihe wanle ba! Ni tingren tamen shou xiwang de youhuo ba! Yinwei tamen bujiu jiu hui zhidao de.
Wo bu huimie yige chengshi ze yi, dan huimie ta, jiu you yige kezhi de dingqi.
Renhe minzu dou buneng xian qi dingqi er miewang, ye buneng hou qi dingqi er lunsang.
Tamen shuo: Shouxiang shi jiaohui de ren a! Ni que shi yige fengzi.
Ni zen bu zhaoshi women yixie tianshen ne? Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de.
Wo zhi ping zhenli er jiang tianshen, dao na shi, tamen shi bu meng huanxing de.
Wo que yi jiang shi jiaohui, wo que shi jiaohui de baohu zhe.
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianle xuduo shizhe, qu jiaohua gudai de ge zongpai.
Meiyou yige shizhe lailin tamen ze yi, dan you shizhe lailin, tamen dou jiayi chaoxiao.
Wo zheyang shi aihao chaoxiao shenru zui renmen de xin.
Tamen bu xin wo de jiaohui, qishi, guren de changdao yi shiqule.
Jiaruo wo wei tamen kaipi yidao tianmen, er tamen cong na dao tianmen jixu deng tian,
tamen biding shuo: Women de yanjing shou mengbile, buran, women shi zhongle moshu de minzhong.
Wo que yi zai tianshang chuangzaole (shi'er) gong, wo wei guancha zhe er xiushi tiankong.
Wo baohuzhe tian, buxu renhe shou zuzhou de emo deyi qinru,
dan qieting de emo ze you mingxian de liuxing gan shang ta.
Wo zhankaile dadi, bing ba xuduo shanyue anzhi zai da dishang, erqie shi ge zhong junheng de dongxi sheng chulai.
Wo zai da dishang wei nimen he nimen suo buneng gongyang zhe er chuangzaole xuduo shenghuo ziliao.
Mei yi zhong shiwu, wo zheli dou you qi cangku, wo zhi yi dingshu jiangxia ta.
Wo paiqian zirun de feng, wo jiu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, yi gongji nimen yinliao, nimen jue bushi yushui de xu cang zhe.
Wo que shi neng shi wanwu sheng, neng shi wanwu si de; wo que shi wanwu de jicheng zhe.
Wo que yi zhidao nimen zhong xianjin de, wo que yi zhidao nimen zhong houjin de.
Ni de zhu biding jihe tamen. Ta que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de.
Wo que yi yong heise de chengxing de niantu chuangzaole ren.
Yiqian, wo ceng yong liehuo chuangzaole jingling.
Dangshi, ni de zhu ceng dui tianshenmen shuo: Wo biding yao yong heise de niantu suzao renxiang er chuangzao ren.
Dang wo ba ta su cheng, erqie ba wo de jingshen chui ru ta de suxiang de shihou, nimen yingdang dui ta fufu koutou.
Suihou, tianshenmen yitong koutou,
wei du yi bo lie si bu ken koutou.
Zhu shuo: Yi bo lie si a! Ni zenme bu koutou ne?
Ta shuo: Ni yong heise niantu su chengren xiang er chuangzao de ren, wo bu gai xiang ta koutou.
Zhu shuo: Ni cong zheli chuqu ba. Yinwei ni que shi bei fangzhu de.
Ni bi zao zuzhou, zhidao baoying ri.
Ta shuo: Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni dui wo huanxing, zhidao renlei fuhuo zhi ri.
Zhu shuo: Ni que shi bei huanxing
dao kezhi de riqi.
Ta shuo: Wo de zhu a! Ni yi panding wo shi mi wu de, suoyi wo shi bi zai da dishang yi zui'e youhuo tamen, wo biding yao shi tamen yitong mi wu.
Chufei tamen zhong ni suo xuanba de puren.
Zhu shuo: Zhe shi wo yingdang weichi de zhenglu.
Wo de puren, ni dui tamen jue wu quanli, chufei naxie shuncong ni de mi wu zhe.
Huo yu biding shi tamen quanti de yueding di difang.
Huo yu you 7 daomen, mei dao menjiang shourong tamen zhong bei pai ding de yibufen ren.
Jingwei zhemen biding zai yixie leyuan he yuanquanzhi jian,
nimen pingping'an'an di jinru leyuan ba!
Wo qingchu tamen xiongzhong de yuanhen, tamen jiang chengwei dixiong, zai gao ta shang xiang dui er zuo.
Tamen zai nali bu ganjue pifa, tamen jue bu bei zhu chu.
Ni gaosu wo de pu renmen, wo que shi zhi she de, zhi ci de;
wo de xingfa que shi tongku de.
Ni yingdang dui tamen xushu yi bo la xin de kerenmen de gushi.
Dangshi, tamen jinqu jian ta, shuo: Zhu ni ping an. Ta shuo: Women que shi weiju nimen de.
Tamen shuo: Ni buyao weiju, women dique yi yige congming de nanhai xiang ni baoxi.
Ta shuo: Wo yi laomai, nimen hai xiang wo baoxi ma? Nimen yi shenme xiang wo baoxi ne?
Tamen shuo: Women ping zhenli er xiang ni baoxi, suoyi ni buyao juewang.
Ta shuo: Chu mi wu zhe wai, shei hui juewang yu zhenzhu de enhui ne?
Ta shuo: Shizhemen a! Nimen you she me chaishi ne?
Tamen shuo: Women feng pai qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong.
Lu te de jiazu chuwai, women que yao ba tamen quandou jiu chulai;
dan ta de qizi chuwai, women yi yuding ta he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa.
Dang shizhemen lai dao lu te de jiali de shihou,
ta shuo: Nimen que shi yixie mosheng de ren.
Tamen shuo: Buran; women ba tamen yixiang zhenglun de (xingfa) dai lai gei nile.
Women ba zhenli dai lai gei nile, women que shi chengshi de.

Ni yingdang daizhe ni de jiazu zai shenye chuxing, ni yao gen zai tamen de houmian, nimen zhong de renhe ren ye buyao huitou kan. Nimen yingdang wang qian zou, yizhi zou dao nimen fengming daoda di difang.
Wo qishi ta zhege panjue: Jiushi zhe deng ren, zai zaochen jiang bei genchu.
Cheng li de jumin xinran er lai,
ta shuo: Zhexie shi wo de keren, nimen buyao lingru wo,
nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, nimen buyao cha ru wo.
Tamen shuo: Nandao women meiyou jinzhi ni yu shiren wanglai ma?
Ta shuo: Zhexie shi wo de nu'er, ruguo nimen yao gan shenme.
Zhi ni de shouming fashi, tamen bi jiang fanghuang yu ziji de diankuang zhi zhong.
Nahan sheng zai ri chu shi xijile tamen.
Wo shi nage shi zhen tianfandifu, bing shi tao shixiang yudian ban jiangluo zai tamen shenshang.
Duiyu neng kaocha zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Nage shi zhen que shi zai yitiao rengran cunzai de daolushang de.
Duiyu xindao zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
Na conglin de jumin que shi bu yi de,
guwo chengzhile tamen. Zhe liang ge difang dou zai pingtan de lu shang.
Shigu de jumin que yi fouren shizhemen.
Wo que yi ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, dan tamen beilile ta.
Tamen anquan de zao shan wei wu,
dan nahan sheng zai zaochen xijile tamen.
Tamen suo mouqiu de, duiyu tamen wujiyushi.
Wo zhi ping zhenli chuangzao tiandi wanwu, fuhuo shi shi biding lailin de. Suoyi ni yingdang wenhe di yuanliang zhongren.
Ni de zhu que shi chuangzao wanwu de zhu, que shi quan zhi de.
Wo que yi shangci ni changchang fanfu songdu de qi jie jing wen he weida de “gulanjing”.
Ni buyao jiyu wo suo shi tamen zhong ge deng ren suo xiangshou de shiwu, ni buyao wei tamen er bei'ai. Ni yingdang wenhe di duidai xinshimen.
Ni shuo: Wo que shi tanshuai de jinggao zhe.
Na zhengru wo suo jiang shi fenpei zhemen de (dongxi) yiyang de,
tamen ba “gulanjing” fenge cheng ruogan zhiti.
Zhi ni de zhu fashi, wo bi jiang tamen quanti jiayi shenwen
shenwen tamen shengqian de xingwei.
Ni yingdang gongkai xuanbu ni suo feng de mingling, erqie bi kai yi wu pei zhu zhe.
Zai duifu chaoxiao zhe fangmian, wo bi shi ni manzu.
Chaoxiao zhe chu zhenzhu wai hai chongbai bie de shenling, bujiu tamen jiu hui zhidaole.
Wo que yi zhidao ni wei tamen de lanyan er fanmen.
Ni yingdang zansong ni de zhu chaojue wanwu, ni yingdang yu zhongren yiqi koutou,
ni yingdang chongbai ni de zhu, zhidao na wuyi de xiaoxi lailin.
Zhenzhu de mingling biding lailin, suoyi nimen bubi yaoqiu qi zaori shixian, zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.

Ta shi tianshenmen feng ta de mingling, xietong jingshen, jianglin tasuo yiyu de puren, shuo: Nimen yingdang jinggao shiren shuo: Chu wo zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, suoyi nimen yingdang jingwei wo.
Ta ping zhenli chuangzaole tiandi, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.
Ta yong jingye chuangzaole ren, er ren que turan bian chengle (ta de) mingxian de duishou.
Ta chuangzaole shengchu, nimen keyi qi mao he pi yuhan, keyi qi ru he rou chongji, hai you xuduo yichu.
Nimen ba shengchu gan hui jia huo fang chuqu chi cao de shihou, shengchu duiyu nimen dou you guangcai.
Shengchu ba nimen de huowu tuo yun dao nimen xu jing kunnan caineng daoda di difang qu. Nimen de zhu que shi zhiren de, que shi zhi ci de.
Ta chuangzao ma, luo, lu, yi gong nimen qi cheng, yi zuo nimen de zhuangshi. Ta hai chuangzao nimen suo bu zhidao de dongxi.
Zhenzhu fuze zhishi zhengdao de zeren. Youxie daolu shi pian xie de, jiaruo ta yiyu, ta bi jiang nimen quanti yinru zhengdao.
Ta cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, nimen keyi yong zuo yinliao, nimen lai yi fangmu de shumu yin zhi er shengzhang.
Ta wei nimen er shengchan zhuangjia, youganlan, ye zao, putao he ge zhong guoshi. Duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
Ta wei nimen er zhifule zhouye he ri yue, qunxing dou shi yin ta de yizhi er bei zhifu de; duiyu neng lijie de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
(Ta you wei nimen er zhifu) tasuo wei nimen chuangzao yu dadi de gese wupin, duiyu neng jiqu jiaohui de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.

Ta zhifu haiyang, yibian nimen yu qu qizhong de xian rou, zuo nimen de shipin; huo caiqu qizhong de zhubao, zuo nimen de zhuangshi. Ni kan chuanbo zai qizhong polang er xing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie.
Ta zai dadishang anzhi xuduo shanyue, yimian da di dongdang, er nimen bude anju. Ta kaipi xuduo heliu he daolu, yibian nimen zunxun zhenglu.
Ta sheli xuduo biaozhi, tamen jiezhu naxie biaozhi he xingsu er zunxun zhenglu.
Nandao zaowuzhu tong buneng chuangzao de (ouxiang) shi yiyang de ma? Nimen zenme bu jiqu jiaohui ne?
Ruguo nimen yao jisuan zhenzhu de enhui, nimen shi wufa tongji de. Zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
Zhenzhu zhidao nimen suoyinhui de, he nimen suo biaobai de.
Tamen she zhenzhu er qidao de buneng chuangzao renhe wu, er tamen shi bei chuangzao de.
Tamen shi si de, bushi huo de, tamen bu zhidao chongbai zhemen jiang zai he shi fuhuo.
Nimen suo yingdang chongbai de shi weiyi de shou chongbai zhe. Buxin houshi de ren, tamen de xin shi fouren de, tamen shi zi da de.
Wuyi de, zhenzhu zhidao tamen suo yinhui de, he tamen suo biaobai de, ta que shi bu xi'ai zi da zhe de.
Youren wen tamen: Nimen de zhu ceng jiang shi shenme? Tamen shuo: Guren de shenhua.
Yibian tamen zai fuhuo ri chengdan ziji de quanbu zeren, yiji bei tamen wuzhi di jiayi wudao zhe de yibufen zeren. Zhen de, tamen suo chengdan de zhen elie!
Qian ren que yi yong jimou, dan zhenzhu ba tamen de jianzhu wu chedi jiayi cuihui, er tamen de wuding luo zai tamen de shenshang. Xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang lailin tamen.

Ranhou zai fuhuo ri ta yao lingru tamen, bing shenwen tamen shuo: Wo naxie huoban--nimen weile tamen er yuxin shimen xiang zhenglun de--rujin zai nali ne? You xueshi zhe jiangyao shuo: Lingru he xingfa jinri bi guiyu bu xindao zhe.
Tamen zai zi kui de qingkuang xia, tianshenmen shi tamen siwang. Tamen biaoshi qufu, shuo: Women meiyou fanguo shen me zui'e. Buran! Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi nimen de xingwei de.
Tamen bei ya jin huo yu er yong ju qizhong. Zi da zhe de zhuchu zhen elie!

Youren wen jingwei zhe shuo: Nimen de zhu ceng jiang shi shenme? Tamen shuo: Ta jiang shi shan yan. Xingshan zhe zai jinshi jiang xiangshou meiman de shenghuo, er houshi de zhuzhai que shi geng hao de. Jing'ai zhe de zhuzhai zhen youmei.
Chang zai de leyuan jiang ren sui tamen jinqu, naxie leyuan xia lin zhu he, qizhong you tamen suo yiyu de. Zhenzhu zheyang baochou jingwei zhe.
Tamen zai lianghao de qingkuang xia, tianshenmen shi tamen siwang. Tian shen dui tamen shuo: Zhu nimen ping'an, nimen keyi yinwei ziji de shangong er jinru leyuan.

(Bu xindao zhe) zhi neng dengdai tianshenmen lailin tamen, huo dengdai ni de zhu de mingling jianglin. Zai tamen zhiqian de ren jiushi zheyang zuo de. Zhenzhu meiyou kui wang tamen, dan tamen que kui wangle ziji.
Suo yi tamen bi zaoshou tamen de xingwei de e bao, er tamen yixiang chaoxiao de (xingfa) jiang baowei tamen.

Yi wu pei zhu zhe shuo: Jiaruo zhenzhu yiyu, ze women he women de zuxian bu hui she ta er chongbai renhe wu de, women ye bu hui shanzi jiechu renhe wu de. Zai tamen zhiqian de ren, ceng zheyang zuoguole. Shizhemen zhi fu mingbai de chuanda de zeren.

Wo zai mei ge minzu zhong, que yi paiqian yige shizhe, shuo: Nimen dang chongbai zhenzhu, dang yuanli emo. Dan tamen zhong you zhenzhu suoyindao de, youyingdang mi wu de. Gu nimen dang zai dadishang luxing, yingdang guancha fouren (shizhe) de renmen de jieju shi zenyang de.
Ruguo nimen rewang tamen huode yindao, namo,(ni de rewang shi turan de), zhenzhu bu yindao na wudao ren zhe, tamen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Tamen zhi zhenzhu er fachu zui yanzhong de shiyan, shuo: Zhenzhu bu shi siren fuhuo. Buran! Zhe shi ta yingdang shijian de nuoyan. Dan shiren daban bu zhidao.
(Ta jiang shi tamen fuhuo), yibian ta wei tamen chanming tamen suo zhenglun de shifei, bingqie rang buxindao zhe zhidao ziji yuan shi shuohuang de.
Dang wo yao chuangzao yi jian shiwu de shihou, wo zhi dui ta shuo sheng you, ta jiu youle.
Zai bei yapo zhihou, wei zhenzhu er qianju zhe, wo zai jinshi shi bi shi tamen huode yige youmei de zhuchu, houshi de baochou shi geng da de, jiaruo tamen zhidao.
Tamen shi jianren de, shi xinlai tamen de zhu de.
Zai ni zhiqian, wo zhi paiqianle wo suo qishi de yixie nanzi. Nimen yingdang qingjiao shen ming jiaohui zhe, ruguo nimen bu zhidao.
(Wo ceng paiqian tamen) daizhe yixie mingzheng he jingdian,(qu jiaohua zhongren), wo jiang shi ni jiaohui, yibian ni dui zhongren chanming tamen suo shou de qishi, yibian tamen siwei.
Shiyong guiji yi zuo'e zhe, nandao bupa zhenzhu shi tamen sui dimian er xianluo, huo xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang lailin tamen ma?
Huo zai tamen de lutu zhong chengzhi tamen, er tamen jue buneng taobi.
Huo zhujian chengzhi tamen, yinwei nimen de zhu que shi zhi ai de, que shi zhi ci de.
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha zhenzhu suo chuangzao de wanwu ma? Ge wu de yinying, pianxiang zuobian he youbian, wei zhenzhu er koutou, tongshi tamen shi beijian de.
Tiandi jian de dongwu he tianshenmen, dou zhi wei zhenzhu er koutou, tamen bu ganzi da.
Tamen weiju zai tamen shangmian de zhuzai, tamen zunxing ziji suo feng de mingling.(Ci chu koutou!)※
Zhenzhu shuo: Nimen buyao chongbai liang ge zhuzai, ying shou chongbai de, zhishi yige zhuzai. Suoyi nimen yingdang zhi weiju wo.
Tiandi wanwu zhishi ta de, shuncong changchang zhi guiyu ta. Nandao nimen she zhenzhu er jingwei ta wu ma?
Fan nimen suo xiangshou de enhui dou shi cong zhenzhu jiangxia de. Ranhou, dang nimen zaonan de shihou, nimen zhi xiang ta qidao.
Ranhou, dang ta jiechu nimen de huannan de shihou, nimen zhong youyibufen ren, like yi wu pei tamen de zhu,
yizhi gufu tasuo shangci tamen de enhui, nimen xiangshou ba. Bujiu nimen jiu yao zhidaole.
Wo suo gongji tamen de caichan, tamen yi qizhong de yibufen qu gongfeng naxie wuzhi de (ouxiang). Zhi zhenzhu fashi, guanyu nimen suo niezao de (shiwu), nimen bi shoushen wen.
Tamen yi nu'er guizhenzhu--zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu--er yi tamen suo yuanwang de gui ziji.
Dang tamen zhong de yige ren ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, ta de lian anran shise, erqie manfu laosao.
Ta wei zhege ehao er bu yu zongzu huimian, ta duofang kaolu: Jiujing shi renru baoliu ta ne? Haishi ba ta huomai zai tu li ne? Zhen de, tamen de panduan zhen elie.
Bu xin houshi zhe, you e li; zhenzhu you dianxing. Ta que shi quanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.

Ruguo zhenzhu wei shiren de bu yi er chengzhi tamen, namo, ta bu liu yige ren zai da dishang, dan ta rang tamen yanchi dao yige dingqi, dang tamen de dingqi lailin de shihou, tamen bude yanchi yi shashi,(dang qi wei lailin de shihou), tamen buneng tiqian yi shashi.
Tamen yi ziji suo yanwu de guizhenzhu, tamen wangyan ziji jiang shou zui jia de baochou. Wuyi de, tamen jiang shou huo yu de baochou. Tamen shi bei yiqi de.

Zhi zhen zhu fashi, zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian xuduo shizhe qu jiaohua ge minzu; dan emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, suo yi jintian ta shi tamen de baohu zhe, tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
Wo jiang shi zhe bu jingdian, zhi wei shi ni dui tamen chanming tamen suo zhenglun de (shifei), bingqie yi zhe bu jingdian zuowei xindao de minzhong de xiangdao he enhui.
Zhen zhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, bing jie yushui shi yi si de da di fuhuo; dui shanyu tinghua de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
Zai shengchu zhong, duiyu nimen, que you yi zhong jiaoxun. Wo shi nimen de yin na cong shengchu fu nei de fen he xue zhi jian tichu de you chunjie you kekou de ruzhi.
Nimen yong ye zao he putao niang zhi chunjiu he jiamei de jiyang, duiyu neng lijie de minzhong, ci zhong que you yi zhong jixiang.
Ni de zhu ceng qishi mifeng: Ni keyi zhu fang zai shanshang he shu shang, yiji renmen suo jianzao de fengfang li.

Ranhou, ni cong mei zhong guoshi shang chi yidian, bing xunfu de zunxun ni de zhu de daolu. Jiang youyi zhong yanse butong, er keyizhi bing de yinliao, cong ta de fu zhong tu chulai; duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.

Zhenzhu chuangzao nimen, ranhou shi nimen siwang. Nimen zhong youren fu fan yu yisheng zhong zui elie de jieduan, yi zhi ta zai you zhishi zhihou you bian de yi wu suo zhi. Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de.

Zai jiyang shang, zhenzhu shi nimen zhong yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren, jiyang youhou zhe jue bu yuan ba ziji de jiyang rang ji ziji de nupu, cong'er tamen zai jiyang shang yu ziji pingdeng, nandao tamen fouren zhenzhu de enhui ma?
Zhenzhu yi nimen de tonglei zuo nimen de qizi, bing wei nimen cong qizi chuangzao ersun. Zhenzhu hai yi jiamei de shiwu gongji nimen. Nandao tamen xinyang xuwang, er gufu zhu en ma?
Tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai (ouxiang), na shi buneng wei tamen zhuchi cong tianshang jiangxia de he cong dishang shengchu de yidian jiyang, erqie hao wu nengli de.
Nimen buyao wei zhenzhuda biyu. Zhenzhu zhidao, er nimen bu zhidao.

Zhenzhuda yige biyu: Yige nuli, buneng ziyou chuli renhe shiwu, yige ziyou ren, wo shangci ta you hou de jiyang, er ta mimi de he gongkai di jiayi shishe; tamen lia ren shi yiyang de ma? Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Dan tamen daban bu zhidao.

Zhenzhu you da yige biyu: Liang ge nanren, yige shi yaba, shenme shi ye buneng zuo, que shi ta zhuren de leizhui, wulun zhuren dafa ta dao nali qu, dou buneng dai yidian fuli huilai; ling yige zou de shi zhenglu, ta quan ren zhuchi gongdao. Tamen lia ren shi yiyang de ma?
Tiandi de youxuan zhishi zhenzhu de. Fuhuo shike de daolai, zhi zai zhuan shunjian, huo geng wei xunsu. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de.
Zhenzhu shi nimen cong mu fu chusheng, nimen shenme ye bu zhidao, ta wei nimen chuangzao ermu he xinling, yibian nimen ganxie.
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai kongzhong bei zhifu de qun niao ma? Zhiyou zhenzhu weichi tamen; duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Zhenzhu yi nimen de jia wei nimen anju zhi suo, yi shengchu de pige, wei nimen de fangwu, nimen zai qicheng zhi ri he zhu dingzhi ri, dou ganjue qi qingbian. Ta yi mianyangmao, luotuo mao he shan yang mao gong nimen zhizao jiaju he zhanshi de xiangshou.

Zhenzhu yi tasuo chuangzao de dongxi zuo nimen de zhe yin, yi qun shan zuo nimen de yinni chu, yi yifu gong nimen fangshu (he yuhan), yi kuijia gong nimen fangyu chuangshang. Ta ruci wancheng ta dui nimen de enhui, yibian nimen shunfu.
Ruguo tamen weibei zhengdao, namo, ni zhi fu mingbai chuanda de zeren.
Tamen renshi zhenzhu de enhui, dan jiayi fouren, tamen daban shi wang'enfuyi de.
Zai na ri, wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong tuiju yige jianzheng, ranhou, bu xindao zhe bude wei ziji bianhu, ye bude xiang tamen taohao.
Dang bu yi zhe kanjian xingfa de shihou, tamen bude jianxing, ye bude huanxing.

Dang yi wu pei zhu zhe kanjian tamen de pei zhu de shihou, tamen jiangyao shuo: Women de zhu a! Zhexie shi women de pei zhu, women ceng she ni er qidao tamen. Naxie pei zhujiang huida tamen shuo: Nimen que shi shuohuang de.
Zai na ri, tamen jiang xiang zhenzhu biaoshi qufu, er tamen suo niezao zhe jiang huibi tamen.
Bu xindao erqie zu'ai zhu dao zhe, wo jiang yin tamen de pohuai er zengjia tamen suo shou de xingfa.

Wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong, tuiju tamen zu zhong de yige jianzheng, lai fanzheng tamen, zai na ri, wo yao tuiju ni lai fanzheng zhe deng ren. Wo ceng jiang shi zhe bu jingdian, chanming wanshi, bing zuo guishun zhe de xiangdao, enhui he xixun.
Zhenzhu dique ming ren gongping, xingshan, shi ji qinqi, bing jin ren yinluan, zuo'e shi, badao; ta quan jie nimen, yibian nimen jiqu jiaohui.
Dang nimen dijie mengyue de shihou, nimen yingdang luxing. Nimen ji yi zhenzhu wei nimen de baozheng zhe, ze dijie mengyue zhihou jiu buyao weibei shiyan. Zhenzhu dique zhidao nimen de xingwei.

Nimen buyao xiang nage fu ren, ta ba fangzhi de hen jieshi de xian you fen chai cheng ruogan lu; nimen yi mengshi wei huxiang qizha de shouduan, yinwei zhe yizu bi na yizu hai yao fushu. Zhen zhu zhi yi ci shi kaoyan nimen. Fuhuo ri, ta bi wei nimen chanming nimen suo zhenglun de shifei.
Jiaruo zhen zhu yiyu, ta bi shi nimen chengwei yige minzu; dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe wu ru mitu, shi tasuo yiyu zhe zunxun zhenglu. Nimen shibi yao wei nimen de xingwei er shoushen wen.
Nimen buyao yi mengshi wei huxiang qizha de shouduan; yimian zhan wen zhihou zai shizu, er nimen jiang yinwei zu'ai zhen zhu de dadao er changshi zaihuo, nimen hai yao shou zhongda de xingfa.
Nimen buyao yi lianjia chumai zhenzhu de mengyue; zai zhenzhu nali de, duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen zhidao.
Nimen suoyou de shi yao hao jin de, zai zhenzhu nali de shi wuqiong de. Wo shi biyao yi jianren zhe suo xing de zuida shangong baochou tamen.
Fan xingshan de nannu xinshi, wo shi biyao shi tamenguo yi zhong meiman de shenghuo, wo shi biyao yi tamen suo xing de zuida shangong baochou tamen.
Dang ni yao songdu “gulanjing” de shihou, ni yingdang qiu zhenzhu baohu, yi fang shou zuzhou de emo de ganrao.
Dui xindao erqie xinlai zhenzhu zhe, ta hao wu quanli.
Ta de quanli zhi xianyu he ta jiao pengyou, erqie yi ta pei zhu zhe.
Dang wo yi yi jie jing wen diaohuan ling yi jie jing wen de shihou--zhenzhu zhidao ziji suo jiang shi de--tamen shuo: Ni zhishi yige niezao zhe. Buran! Tamen daban shi bu zhidao de.
Shengling cong ni de zhu nali jiang shi zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian, yibian ta shi xindao zhe jianding, bingyong zuo gui xinzhe de xiangdao he xixun.
Wo dique zhidao, tamen shuoguo: Zhe zhishi yige fanren suo chuanshou de. Tamen suo qingxiang di nage ren de yuyan shi hua wairen (de yuyan), er zhe (bu jingdian de yuyan) shi mingbai de alabo yu.
Buxin zhenzhu de jixiang zhe, zhenzhu biding bu yindao tamen, er tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
Buxin zhenzhu de jixiang zhe, cai shi niezaole huangyan de, zhe deng ren que shi shuohuang de.
Ji xin zhenzhu zhihou, you biaoshi buxin zhe--chufei bei po xuancheng buxin, neixin que wei xinyang er jianding zhe--wei buxin er xinqing shuchang zhe jiang zao tianqian, bing shou zhongda de xingfa.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen ning ai jinshi shenghuo er bu ai houshi, ye yin wei zhenzhu bu yindao bu xindao de minzhong.
Tamen shi zhenzhu jiang fengbi qi xinling he shiting de ren. Zhe deng ren shi qingshuai de.
Wuyi de, tamen zai houshi zheng shi kui she zhe.
Ranhou, ni de zhu duiyu beihai zhihou qianju, ranhou fendou, erqie jianren zhe, ni de zhu zai na zhihou que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
(Ni huiyi) zai na ri, mei ge linghun dou lai wei ziji bianhu, er mei ge linghun dou de xiangshou ziji xingwei de wanquan de baochou. Tamen bu shou kui wang.

Zhenzhuda yige biyu: Yige shi zhen, yuan shi anquan de, anwen de, fengfu de jiyang cong ge fang yun lai, dan zhen shang de jumin gufu zhenzhu de enhui, suoyi zhenzhuyin tamen de xingwei er shi tamen changshi jidu de jihuang he kongbu.
Tamen zu zhong de yige shizhe que yi lailin tamen, dan tamen fourenle ta. Zai tamen bu yi de qingkuang xia, xingfa xijile tamen.
Nimen keyi chi zhenzhu shangci nimen de hefa er jiamei de shiwu, nimen yingdang ganxie zhenzhu de enhui, ruguo nimen zhi chongbai ta.

Ta zhi jinzhi nimen chi zi si wu, xieye, zhurou, yiji song fei zhenzhu zhi ming er tuzai zhe. Dan wei shi suo po, fei chu ziyuan, qie buguo fen zhe, namo, zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
Nimen duiyu ziji suo xushu de shi, buyao wangyan: Zhe shi hefa de, na shi weifa de. Yizhi nimen jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er zaoyao. Jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er zaoyao zhe bi bu chenggong.
(Tamen zhide) dao yidian xiangshou, er tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
Dui youtai jiaotu, wo ceng jin jie wo congqian suo gaosuguo ni di naxie shiwu, wo meiyou kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji.
Ranhou, ni de zhu duiyu wuzhi er zuo'e, yihou you huiguo zi xin de ren, que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
Yi bo la xin yuanlai shi yige biaoshuai, ta fucong zhenzhu, xinfeng zhengjiao, erqie bushi yi wu pei zhu de.
Ta yuan shi ganxie zhu en de, zhu tiaoxuanle ta, bing jiang ta yin shangle zhenglu.
Zai jinshi, wo ceng yi xingfu shangci ta, zai houshi, ta biding juyu shanren zhi lie.
Ranhou, wo qishi ni shuo: Ni yingdang zunshou xinfeng zhengjiao de yi bo la xin de zongjiao, ta bushi yi wu pei zhu de.
Anxiri shi naxie wei zhi er zhenglun de ren suo yingdang zunshou de dingzhi. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei.

Ni ying ping zhihui heshan yan er quan ren zunxun zhu dao, ni yingdang yi zui youxiu de taidu yu ren bianlun, ni de zhu dique zhidao shei shi beili ta de zhengdao de, ta dique zhidao shei shi zunxun ta de zhengdao de.
Ruguo nimen yao baofu, jiu yingdang yizhao nimen suo shou de shanghai er baofu. Ruguo nimen rongren, na duiyu rongren zhe shi geng hao de.
Ni yingdang rongren--ni de rongren zhi lai zhenzhu de youzhu--ni buyao wei tamen er beishang, buyao wei tamen de jimou er fannao.
Zhen zhu que shi tong jingwei zhe he xingshan zhe zai yiqi de.
